{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::6153347e666eff10ad74d684::headhunter_kz", "source": "headhunter_kz", "country": "KZ", "company": "Air Energi Caspian LLP trading as Airswift", "position": "GP Utilities Piping Engineer", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: более 6 лет

Полная занятость, Вахтовый метод

Essential requirements:

Education (Diploma):

Degree Mechanical Engineering or Relevant Industry Experience

Relevant Experience:

10 + years international experience in pre-commissioning and commissioning management at refineries, LNG plants, petrochemical, and power generation plants.

Proven expertise in coordinating large scopes of work during pre-commissioning – commissioning phases and start up.

Strong interpersonal and articulate communications skills in cultivating and maintaining positive working team with diverse backgrounds

Execute commissioning & start-up procedures.

Technical competencies : Commissioning & Start-up

Skills: Similar Coordination Role
